Title: Hart to Hart: Secrets of the Hart

reviewText: In typical Hart to Hart fashion, this movie had some mystery, action and of course, romance.  I thought it was a great movie and would recommend it to anyone who enjoyed the Hart to Hart series.
Title: Hart to Hart: Secrets of the Hart

reviewText: If you like the series, then the movies are a must. They are hard to find in the stores, if you can find them at all.
Title: Hart to Hart: Secrets of the Hart

reviewText: I am a huge Hart to Hart fan!!  It's great to see those two in action again. In this one, Jonathan almost finds a sister and Robert Wagner's real daughter plays in this. It was great. I hope Sony releases seasons 3,4, and 5 soon.
Title: Hart to Hart: Secrets of the Hart

reviewText: Love Stephanie Powers and everything she does.  Had to get these just because.  I get in a mood for simple entertainment and this is wonderful.
Title: Hart to Hart: Secrets of the Hart
